sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Container, View, Logo, Icon} from '../../atoms' import { Navigation, TextIcon } from '../../molecules' import Link from 'next/link' import './styles.scss' const Header = ({direction, items}) => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) const toggle = () => { setOpen(!open) console.log("IS OPEN :: ",open) } return ( ) } export default Header
